Text.Page:
Rumor has it we need the Barbican cleared for some Mysterium sappers. Don't know if they'll get here, but we need the lurking storm lizards taken out just the same.

Can't miss them. They look completely out of place.

You killed them? Fantastic!

Looks like I'm stuck here waiting for the Mysterium while you get to cover yourself with glory.

Good luck out there, !
